rows.label: tev019101_SEL0011
rows.name:
Ask Enrai for his thoughts on
your battle with the Zu Pharg.

rows.label: tev019101_MSG0001
rows.name:
The Ganglion have a history of using such death
machines to wage scorched-earth warfare. They've
apparently been used to destroy numerous worlds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019101_MSG0002
rows.name:
You might say that the Ganglion consider these giant
weapons of mass annihilation to be their trump card.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019101_MSG0003
rows.name:
I assumed your encounter would have ended in tragedy
as well. We were fortunate that you were able to
destroy it when you did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019101_MSG0010
rows.name: Gathering zesian fleawort, chasing after rizattices...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Lately, we've been taking on smaller missions that we
can handle at our current level of experience.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019101_MSG0012
rows.name:
With enough practice from those sorts of simple jobs,
we can grow into a team that's strong enough to
complete more important assignments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019101_MSG0013
rows.name:
I will never forget the lessons you risked life and limb
to teach us. Thank you for showing us the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev019101_MSG0014
rows.name:
I must stay diligent in my training so that one day I
can repay this debt to you.[ST:wait ]
